participant_1.background:
I have trained over 20 types of animals.
I work with my wife.
My wife is a breast cancer survivor.
I am a zookeeper.
My daughter just graduated high school ranked at the top of her class.

participant_2.background:
I am highly educated.
I work at a newspaper.
I am a carnivore.
My father used to be a butcher.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks!
That's good to hear! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a zookeeper! I work with my wife, who is a breast cancer survivor.
That's really interesting! What's your favorite part of the job?
I love working with the animals. I've trained over 20 different types of animals, and it's always a rewarding experience to see them learn and grow.
Wow, that's amazing! I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it sounds like you love it.
I do! It's the best job in the world.
I can imagine! So, what are some of the animals you've trained?
I've trained monkeys, bears, lions, tigers, elephants, and giraffes, just to name a few.
That's incredible! How do you even start training an elephant?
It's a lot of patience and positive reinforcement. You have to build a relationship with the animal and earn their trust. Once they trust you, you can start teaching them tricks and commands.
That's really interesting. I've always been fascinated by animals, but I've never had the chance to work with them.
It's definitely a rewarding experience. If you ever get the chance, I highly recommend it.
I will! Thanks for the info.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about animals.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and friends. We like to go on hikes, go to the beach, and just relax together. I also love to read and play video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love reading and playing video games too.
We should get together sometime and play video games!
That would be great! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll text you my number.
Sounds good! I'll see you then.
